assembly.cable.remove: Sneak and use to remove selection
assembly.cable.replace: Use to move selection. Use and sneak to remove selection
block.assembly.patch_cable.tooltip.summa: Used to transfer data between other _Patch Cables_ and into various devices.
item.assembly.hole_puncher.tooltip.summa: Used with any _Punch Card_ to create data for various devices.
item.assembly.hole_puncher.tooltip.actio: Opens the _Punch Card Interface_ if any _Punch Card_ is in the opposing hand.
item.assembly.byte_card.tooltip.summary: Used in devices as a simple datasheet. Highly recommended for setting a _Patch Cables_ port.
